sentences.en: But after all I could not recede.
sentences.cn: 但是我毕竟不能打退堂鼓.

sentences.en: Eventually the danger began to recede.
sentences.cn: 这种危险终于开始减轻.

sentences.en: Generally, warm colours advance in painting and cold colours recede.
sentences.cn: 通常，绘画中暖色调为近感色，而冷色调为远感色。

sentences.en: He saw that the dirty water had begun to recede.
sentences.cn: 他发现那污浊的水开始往下退了.

sentences.en: His hair is beginning to recede from his forehead.
sentences.cn: 他的头发开始从前额往后秃了.

sentences.en: If it was used little or not at all, then it recede.
sentences.cn: 如果对它使用很少或完全不使用, 它就会退化.

sentences.en: Just as I started to think that I was never going to get well, the illness began to recede.
sentences.cn: 正当我开始觉得自己永远都好不了了的时候，我的病开始好转了。

sentences.en: Moses watched him recede in the mud of the lane.
sentences.cn: 摩西看着他从那条小巷的泥泞中离去.

sentences.en: She seemed to recede, and now it was difficult to call to her.
sentences.cn: 她似乎渐渐地远去, 她的喊声已经很难送到她的耳朵里了.

sentences.en: The colleges would recede in importance.
The flood waters finally began to recede in November.
The goal of an insect - free world continued to recede.
sentences.cn: 实现无昆虫这一目标越来越渺茫.

sentences.en: The mountain peaks recede into the distance as one leaves the shore.
sentences.cn: 人离岸时,山峰向后退去.

sentences.en: The pain in his head gradually receded.
The sense of duty dominates all else, and personal claims recede.
sentences.cn: 责任感压倒一切, 个人的打算也就退居其次了.

sentences.en: You have taken the vows; you cannot recede.
sentences.cn: 你已经发过誓, 你不能退却了.

trans.tran_en: if water recedes, it moves back from an area that it was covering

trans.tran_cn: 后退，减弱，（价值，品质等）跌落，低落，变坏，收回意见，退出（某种活动）
trans.tran_en: if something you can see or hear recedes, it gets further and further away until it disappears
